meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hillary Meyer Barry Peterson Keith Whitener Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6468.

td.p: Hillary Meyer, a stay-at-home mom and blogger from Middletown, New York
Barry Peterson, a financial risk analyst from El Paso, Texas
Keith Whitener, a research chemist originally from Charlotte, North Carolina (whose 5-day cash winnings total $100,397)

tr.td: ON THE JOB
NAME THAT SPEECHMAKER
BASEBALL TIMELINE
JOHN, IN HIS OWN WRITE
COMPLETES THE LICENSE PLATE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Per his wife, Todd Palin is "a lifelong commercial" one of these on the seas')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Per his wife, Todd Palin is "a lifelong commercial" one of these on the seas

')
